name: block-development-examples/faq-block
title: FAQ Accordion
description: Display frequently asked questions in an accordion layout

subtitle.default: Explore our most frequently asked questions below to find the answers you need. If you don't see your question, feel free to contact our friendly support team for assistance.

default.question: Can I customise my order?
default.answer: Yes! Many of our furniture pieces come with customisation options like fabric, colour, and size. Just check the product details or contact our team for assistance.

default.question: What are the delivery options?
default.answer: We offer standard delivery (3-5 business days), express delivery (1-2 business days), and white glove delivery service for larger items that includes installation and packaging removal.

default.question: Do you offer a return policy?
default.answer: Yes, we have a 30-day return policy. Items must be in original condition with all packaging. Custom orders may have different return terms - please check the product details.

default.question: How do I care for my furniture?
default.answer: Each piece comes with specific care instructions. Generally, avoid direct sunlight, clean regularly with appropriate products, and address spills immediately. For detailed care, refer to the product manual.

default.question: Do you offer financing options?
default.answer: Yes, we offer several financing options through our partners. You can see available plans during checkout, with options for 0% interest and flexible payment terms on qualifying purchases.
